MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY15 postcode area of Cupar. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 09:00am to safely carry out repairs on our overhead line networks and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:52am on Friday, 23 April 2021
